form.description: Enter your information to access the system now!

carousel.title: Film Project with Artificial Intelligence - Admin Dashboard
carousel.description: Managing your film library and interacting with AI has never been easier.

toast.unauthorized: The account does not have permission to access the system administration page!
toast.error: An authentication error has occurred. Please log in again.

errors.google_unknown: An unknown error occurred during authentication.
errors.SYS_201: This Google account does not have permission to access the system.
errors.SYS_500: The system is experiencing a technical issue, please try again later.
errors.USR_320: Your account has been removed from the system.
errors.USR_330: Your account is currently temporarily suspended.
errors.ACCOUNT_DELETED: Your account has been deleted from the system.
errors.ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Your account is currently temporarily suspended.

text.contact_admin_hint: If you believe this is an error, please contact the admin.
